attributes.action: Ban unelected ministers from sitting in the cabinet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some cabinet members - the Lord Chancellor for example - are unelected and are only in the cabinet because they have been appointed by the Prime Minister.

This makes a mockery of democracy - every cabinet member should be elected.

The rules should be changed to ensure that only elected ministers are allowed to sit in the cabinet.
